src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
I like working with and getting to know new people!
target: I take it you're very social then?

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
I am eager to learn more about marketing and you have some very talented people here.
target: Yes we really do. what are you eager to learn specifically?

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
It's exiting to be part of such a big company. i have only worked at smaller firms before.
target: And how do you think it will be to work in a bigger company?

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
I think it sounds like an exiting project. i really like to dig in to something new.
target: That's good. do you ever get bored of repetetive tasks?

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
The location is really good. i live only five minutes away.
target: Yes it's a good location. where do you live?

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
The job description said it included a lot of variety. i think that sounds good
target: Is variety in your job important to you?

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
The job description said it included travelling. i like seeing new places and being on the move.
target: Yes you would travel quite a lot during parts of the year.

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
I like taking care of people. it makes me feel important!
target: I see, that sounds like a good quality for this job!

src:
What do you think seems fun about this job?
It seems like a challening project.
target: Yes that's why we are looking for new competence. what is your experience with working in a team?

src:
You've applied for the job as fireman. what do you think is fun about this job?
It makes me feel important to help people in difficult situations.
target: And how would you feel if you fail on a mission?

src:
You've applied for the job as clerk here. what do you think is fun about this job?
I like to help people who are looking to buy something. it's very fun to recommend products to customers.
target: Have you worked as a clerk before?

src:
You've applied for the job as taxi driver. what do you think is fun about this job?
I've always liked driving cars, and getting somewhere is a fun puzzle to solve.
target: And are you good at talking to customers? would you describe yourself as social?

src:
You've applied for the job as nurse. what do you think is fun about this job?
It's a job where a lot of things happen and i like always having something to do and not being passive.
And have you worked as a nurse before?
Yes, for five years before my maternity leave.
target: Okay and when can you start working?

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
I used to work at a small firm where we had a very tight team. it felt like a group of friends who happened to work together.
target: I understand, because that's how i feel about working here!

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
In my second job at ikea i had a really nice manager that i clicked with.
target: Tell me a little more about what was good about that.

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
In my last job i had a very experienced senior who taught me a lot about programming.
target: Did you work closely together with this person for a long time? what was the most valuably lesson they taught you?

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
I worked in a place where i had a lot of freedom in my working hours. i liked being able to set my own schedule sometimes.
target: That sounds nice, but i'm not sure we can offer that flexibility here.

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
I recently had a temporary position as event organiser which i thought was super fun, although challenging at times.
target: What made it challenging? and what did you learn?

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
I don't know
Okay, i see. what about your best colleague?
I worked with a really cool girl in my last job.
target: What about her was cool?

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
When i worked for a political party when i was young. 
What made it a good experience?
It felt like a community and it was very meaningful for me to work there.
target: That sounds inspirational!

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
I worked with software testing of an app when i was a student. it was my first real job experience and i learnt a lot.
target: What kind of sofware did you test? what was the app called?

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
I had a part time job when i finished my studies, and it was really nice to get a foot into the job market before i was actually finished.
target: What kind of a part time job was it?

src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
When i lived in canada, i worked as a cleaner at a small family business. everyone was very friendly and it was always fun to go to work.
target: Would you say that you felt at home there?

src:
What makes you fit well as a police?
I think that i am very good at talking to people in difficult situations. i am good at being calm even though i am in a pressed situation.
target: Okay, can you describe a situation where you had to stay calm?

src:
What makes you fit well as a construction worker?
I've always been good at working physically. i think it's fun.
target: What about it makes it fun? are you also good at working with others?

src:
What makes you a good shop clerk?
I am organised and have a good memory, so i am good at helping customers find what they are looking for.
That sounds good. and how are you with people?
In what way?
target: I am wondering if you think of yourself as a social person?

src:
What makes you fit well as a taxi driver?
I'm good at driving cars.
target: Okay, for how long have you had your license?

src:
What makes you fit well as a nurse?
I am friendly with people, and am very good at calming sick people.
How do you handle someone who isn't calm?
I carefully explain what is going on and explain the medical procedure.
target: And if that does not work?

src:
What makes you fit well as a teacher?
I find value in teaching others.
target: Do you ever have any problem when people don't want to learn?

src:
What makes you fit well as a doctor?
I'm very intelligent and to cure sick people is what drives me. it's something i've dreamed of since i was a child.
target: So you take a lot of pride in your work?

src:
What makes you fit well as a chef?
I have always loved cooking food.
target: For how long have you worked in the kitchen?

src:
What makes you fit well as a waiter?
I have fast reflexes and like when things are fast paced.
target: And how do you handle stress when things are hectic for a long time?

src:
You have applied for the job as receptionist. what makes you a good fit?
I like to talk to people and i'm always nice and pragmatic.
target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How do you like your collegues?
target: I like my colleagues. anything else you're wondering?

src:
You have applied for the job as waiter. what makes you a good fit?
I am observant and have a good memory
I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?
Once i had a customer that changed his order, and forgot that the order was changed. he was very upset that he did not remember that. i managed to remember him about the change.
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there a need for working overtime? i have small children and can have difficulties with that.
target: Only occasionally. anything else?

src:
You have applied for the job as manager for our warehouse. what makes you suitable for this position?
I am good at organizing both people and administration.
target: I understand. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

src:
What is the most important for you in a management position?
That responsabilites and authorities correspond.
Yes you will have a proper job description. anything else?
Is overtime financially compensated or do you offer an extra week of vacation?
target: You will have an extra week of vacation

src:
You have applied for the job as cleaner of our office. what about you as a person makes you a good cleaner?
I like to clean and tidy up and i am very careful and efficent.
target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Will i be the only cleaner in the office?
No, there's another person you will work with.
During my vacation who will do the cleaning?
target: We will hire a temp to take care of it. any other questions?

src:
You have applied for the job as controller. what makes you a good fit?
I like figures and am well organised. i always deliver on time.
target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
To whom will i report?
Your manager will be the cfo. anything else?
How many people work in finance?
target: There's five people in finance right now, but we might hire more people soon.

src:
You have applied for the job as finance assistant. what makes you a good fit?
I am good at reading figures and am detail oriented. and i always deliver on time.
target: Can you explain more about how you are detail oriented?

You have applied for the job as it-support of our office. what makes you a good fit?

target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Will i be the only one in it-support in the office?
I like my colleagues. anything else?
During my vacation who will do the support?
target: We will hire a student to cover for you during your vacation.

To have a guiding manager who can teach me in the beginning

When the market for newpapers went down i did not know what way to direct my employees

I have motivation for and skills for administration.

When i hired the wrong person for the reception.

The person did not take responsibility over their job.

src:
You have applied for the job as controller. what makes you a good fit?
I like figures and i am well organised. i always deliver on time.
I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?
Once i did not recieve material in time from one of the employees and managed to explain in a nice way how important it was for the company to deliver reports on deadline.

To whom will i report?
target: Your manager will the cfo. anything else?

src:
You have applied for the job as finance assistant. what makes you a good fit?

target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do a good job?

src:
You have applied for the job as it-support of our office. what makes you a good fit?
I like to clean and fix computers and i am very careful and efficent.
I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

Will i be the only one in it-support in the office?
No we've got a team of four people working already and you would be our fifth.

I am very motivated and have skills to lead people.

src:
You have applied for the job as carpenter. what makes you a good fit?
I am good at working with many different tools.

src:
What is most important for you in a this position?
To have a guiding manager
You will work close to your manager. anything else?
What will be my conditions if you employ me
target: We follow the conditions by the union

src:
We would like to know what you think about working in a rehabilitation company
I am a positive person and believe in people's own possibilites and respect for integrity
Tell me about your education?
I have an education in sociologi
What do you know about us?
I know you as a company with a positive attitude to employees
target: When can you start?

src:
Why are you applying for this job?
I am unemployed.
What have you been doing before?
I have been working as secretary
Do you have an education for administration?
No, but i learn quickly
target: What are your strongest characteristics?

src:
What makes you interested in working in a nursery school?
I like children an i am very patient
Do you have any experience from working with children
No but i always had to take care of my brothers and sisters
target: Do you  have any references that can prove your personality?

src:
You want to work as laboratory assistant. is that correct?
Yes it has always been my dream to analyse specimen
Do you have education for this job and experience?
I just got my diploma after examination but have no practical experience
target: We belong to a union, are you member of a union?

src:
I see you have applied for a job as car mechanic
Yes i always loved to cars.
Have you any experience since before?
My father is a mechanical working in his own garage, and i have often helped him
Are you updated with the latest technology for cars?
Quite well
target: How would you describe yourself?

src:
I see you have long experience of working in hospitals. how do you describe your personality?
I am kind and caring. i am considerate towards patients and detail oriented.
This job can be quite heavy, are you physically prepared for this?
Yes i am strong but i presume i will work together with a colleague.
target: Are you prepared to work full time or part time?

src:
What make you think you will be a good fireman?
I have a good physique and i have no problems working night shifts.
Do you have a family?
Yes a wife and two children
Have you any experience before?
Yes, but not from this area
target: Will you accept a trial period of 6 months?

src:
You have applied to a position as police man? what makes you think you could work as a police man
I have the education and has worked 4 years in another town.
Are you aware of the working hours in this position?
Yes.
Describe your strongest personality trait
I am calm and have a strong mind
target: And you weak sides?

src:
You are looking for a job as contrution worker. why are you applying this job?
I have heard you have a code of conduct that would fit me
How would you descibe a perfect manager?
A person who is strict and fair
In what area of construction have you worked before?
Both house building as a brick layer
target: How long did you do brick laying for? and are you used to working overtime?

src:
You have applied for the job as receptionist. what makes you a good fit?
I like to talk to people and i'm always nice and pragmatic.
target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?

src:
What makes you a good fit as a car mechanic?
I am very good at fixing cars.
target: What kind of cars have you worked with?

src:
You have applied for the job as janitor. what do you think seems fun about this job?
I like when things are clean, and i enjoy doing physical work.
target: Have you worked as a janitor before?

src:
You have applied for the job as teacher. what do you think seems fun about this job?
I really love teaching kids. i gives me joy each morning when i go to work.
target: What are the school subjects that you have taught the most?

src:
You have applied for the job as secretary. what do you think seems fun about this job?
I really like to work with other people, and by working as a secretary i will come in contact with a lot of different people.
target: What would your perfect work day look like?

src:
If you are going to work as a janitor, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When i was high school i would often do projects with the other students in my school.
target: What types of problems would you usually do?

src:
If you are going to work as a medical doctor, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I volunteered as an assistant for doctors without borders when i started medical school.
target: Where did you volunteer?

src:
If you are going to work as an engineer, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have been working in several open source coding projects, where multiple programmers have to work together to get the code to run efficient.
target: I see, so what type of open source projects have you worked on?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I have always liked to get to know my collegues. it is so much fun to talk to new people.
target: Are there any old collegues that you are still friends with?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I like helping people, so when i worked as a nurse in the hospital i really felt that i made a difference in the world.
target: What type of work did you do in the hospital?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I think that was when i worked as a teacher and i got to see the kids in my class understand a new subject. that was the best experince that i have ever had.
target: What kind of teaching did you do?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I don't know, it is hard to tell. there is not necessarily only one thing that i have enjoyed more than anything else.
target: But if you had to choose one thing, what would it be?

src:
What makes you fit well as a taxi driver?
I love to drive, and i like to talk to people. i am also very good at remebering street names.
target: Are you a good driver?

src:
What makes you fit well as a chasier?
I am friendly, i like to help people and i am quick at making simple calculations.
target: Is there anything related to being a chasier that you are not so good at?

src:
What makes you fit well as a nurse?
I am kind, and i like the field of medicine.
target: Have you any experince outisde of medicine that you think would be valuable when working as a nurse?

src:
What makes you fit well as a baby sitter?
I enjoy to play, epescially to lay puzzles.
target: Do you have any younger siblings that you have taken care of before?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
I wonder what the pay is?
target: We pay 25.000 sek each month. if you work overtime, you will get compensated for that as well.

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
No i do not think so.
target: Great, we will let you know as soon as we have interviewed the other candidates as well

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I really liked my work tasks, they gave me meaning.
target: Which work task did you enjoy the most?

src:
What makes you fit well as a cook?
I love food, and i like to prepare food.
target: What is your favourite meal to prepare?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
Talking to new clients.
target: Where were your clients from?

src:
What makes you fit well as a construction worker?
I like details, and i am quite strong.
target: Do you have any other characteristics that would be suitable for the job?

src:

In general, i like to build things. being a part of that process really makes me want to perform.
target: Have you have any other experince in construction?

src:
If you are going to work as a mail man, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I often organise parties in my neighbourhood. we are often 3 to 4 people who plan everything from the food to the music.
target: What is your role in those planning sessions?

src:
You have applied for the job as lead developer. what do you think seems fun about this job?
I love to program and i love even more to tell other people what to do.
target: Do you think that you are a good leader?

src:
If you are going to work as a police officer, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked in an office when i was 20. we did projects together all the time.
target: What kind of projects did you do?

src:
You have applied for the job as kindergarden teacher. what do you think seems fun about this job?
I enjoy working with kids and i love to teach.
target: Do you have any children yourself?

src:
If you are going to work as a firefighter, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have worked as a firefighter before and we used to work in a team.
target: How many were you in your team?

src:
What makes you fit well as a manager?
I believe that i have a good overview of things and i think that i can get the best out of employees.
target: Do you have any management skills?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
When can i start?
target: We are going through candidates but we hope that that the person we choose can start at the beginning of next month.

src:
What is your experience with working with sales?
I have worked in a fashion store selling clothes. i was responsible for opening and closing the store as well as the cashier. when i was younger, i also worked with telemarketing.
For how long did you work with telemarketing?
3 months
target: What did you learn by working with telemarketing?

src:
There is a hole in your resume around the year 2014. what happened then?
I was on maternity leave and after that i did not find a job immediately.
target: I see.

src:

I am 45 years old, married with two kids. i am currently unemployed but i am very motivated to work.
How long have you been unemployed.
Two years
target: I see. what was the last job you had.

I always liked to work with sales as i consider myself good at dealing with people.
Great. tell me more about your experience of working with sales and people relations.
I worked for 5 years at an office supply company with internal and external sales.
target: What were your responsibilites at this company?

src:
How do you cope with working under stress?
I am fine with that. i am used to working under stress.
target: Great. could you give me an example of a job you have had where you had to handle stress?

src:
What did your last employer like most about you?
They liked that i was very organized in my work, positive, and reliable.
target: Do you take pride in being organized in your work?

src:
Where do you see yourself in 5 years
I am aiming at becoming a manager of this branch
Do you have any work experience of being a manager?
No, not yet.
target: Do you have any study background in terms of leadership and organization?

src:
You have applied for a position in customer support. what kind of skills do you have that make you a good fit?
I am very friendly with people and like to make customers satisfied.
target: How do you make customers satisfied?

src:
You have applied for a teaching position. what kind of skills do you have that make you a good teacher?
I am good at explaining things and making learning fun!
target: That sounds interesting, can you talk a little more about how you make learning fun?

src:
What’s your best experience from your previous jobs?
I worked with a nice manager in my second job. it was great.
target: What made your manager nice to work with?

src:
What’s your best experience from your previous jobs?
I worked with a nice manager in my second job. it was great.
target: What made your manager nice to work with?

Thank you very much.

No, not at all. i am familiar with this part of town since before.

Thank you very much.
How was your trip? was it hard to find your way here?
I had some troubles yes, but i managed to find my way just in time.
target: Yes i can imagine, it is a rather unknown neighbourhood. anyhow, would you like a cup of coffee before we start?

src:
Welcome to this interview!
Thank you very much.
How was your trip? was it hard to find your way here?
I had some troubles yes, but i managed to find my way just in time.
Yes i can imagine, it is a rather unknown neighbourhood. anyhow, would you like a cup of coffee before we start?
No thank you, but i would like a cup of tea. i am actually not a big fan of coffee.
target: Of course, i will get you a cup of tea.

src:
So, can you tell me a bit about yourself?
Sure. i am 27 years old and i have worked mostly within construction before. i got laid off due to economical reasons, where the company went bankrupt.
Oh, that must have been quite dramatic. were there any specific reason they went bankrupt?
I am not sure, i think it was a mix of bad luck and a recess in economy.
target: I see, and now you are thinking of moving to another industry?

src:
What makes you want to change career paths at this time?
Well, sometimes you come to a certain point in life where you feel that you are ready for new challenges, and a new day to day life.
target: I see, and what interests you the most about this job?

src:
You have applied for the job as baker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I think it is interesting to learn new baking skills.
target: What baking skills do you already have?

src:
What makes you a good fit?
I studied food safety and sanitation standards.
target: What course did you study?

src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have a junior baker with me back in my home country and we worked together for three years.
target: That sounds good, but why did you leave your job in your home country?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there any opportunity for growth with your company within three years?
target: Yes, you can be a senior baker where you can participate in product development of limited edition artisan pastries sooner or later, depending on your performance.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I got promoted as the senior baker at the pastry shop and had the chance to learn some leadership skills.
target: What is your main obligation as a senior baker?

src:
You have applied for the job as baker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
First of all, I like you company. And second, I would like to learn baking new things.
target: What attracted you to our company.

src:
What makes you a good fit?
I like to bake things, and to get up early in the morning.
target: What is you favourite thing to bake?

src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have been on the board for my local football club for several years.
target: That sounds good, but have you had any experience working with others in your profession?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do I have to buy and bring my own equipment to the bakery?
target: No, everything you need will be available at the bakery.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked at a local cafe, I had great colleagues.
target: What did you do at the cafe?

src:
You have applied for the job as a healthcare worker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like caring for people. I had done volunteer works before in remote locations that lacked healthcare providers.
target: What is your job position while doing volunteer works?

src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have a lot of patience working with people.
target: What kind of people have you cared for before?

src:
If you are going to work in the healthcare industry, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I worked as a staff nurse, I worked with other nurses like me. We help each other with our responsibilities.
target: What help did they get from you as their fellow nurse?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What shifts are currently available right now?
target: We have morning shifts and night shifts available.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
In my past job, I cared for the elderly. I became friends with them.
target: That sounds good. What do you think they befriended you?

src:
You have applied for the job as a healthcare worker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I really like to help people, it makes me happy.
target: Is there anything else you like about this job?

src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have both an education and relevant experience working in the health care industry.
target: What is the relevant experience or education for working in the healthcare industry that you have?

src:
If you are going to work in the healthcare industry, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I worked as a medical receptionist, I had a team of colleagues and we had a great collaboration.
target: What did you collaborate about with your colleagues?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How long are the work days?
target: You start at eight in the morning and finish at half past four in the afternoon. Would you like to ask anything else?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I really liked when I did volunteer work.
target: That sounds interesting. Where did you do you volunteer work?

src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
It's interesting to work for a company that does repair big vehicles like you.
target: Do you have experience repairing trucks?

src:
If you are going to work in our car shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. For one vehicle , we are usually working with a team of two to three people.
target: How many days does it usually take for one vehicle repair to finish?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What is the working schedule?
target: The schedule will be five days a week, eight hours a day starting at seven o'clock in the morning.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when I got my hands on my first electric car repair.
target: That's nice. How's your experience with electric cars?

src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like cars and I would like to get better as a mechanic.
target: What is your favourite car to work on?

src:
If you are going to work in our car shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have always worked with my father on various cars. We like to discuss all things related to cars.
target: Is you father a car mechanic as well?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What kind of cars would I be working with?
target: Out customers have all types of cars, so it is hard to say exactly.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I build my first engine.
target: That is impressive. Did it work?

src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like to assist customers and save their time finding what they want.
target: Do you like chatting with customers?

src:
If you are going to work in our shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked at a retail store before and every Monday our manager arranges a meeting with us to make sure we are working as a team.
target: What does your manager require you to do?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What perks do you offer for your workers?
target: Some of our perks include a twenty percent discount on our items and monthly gift cards when you hit a required sale mark.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when one of our regular customers appreciated my work ethic and gave me a holiday gift.
target: What is your work ethic?

src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like to make things look nice in the store. All clothes should be neatly folded.
target: Do you like to shop yourself?

src:
If you are going to work in our shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I was in college, I used to work at a restaurant. There I was working with a lot of other people.
target: What did you do at the restaurant?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do I get any discounts in the store?
target: All employees get 20 percent of on all articles.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked at a restaurant. I loved cooking and coming up with new recipes.
target: Did you come up with any recipes from scratch?

src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
The salary is good and I have heard from some friends that this is a great place work.
target: Do you have many friends that are working here.

src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have worked in a similar warehouse before, with around ten colleagues.
target: Why did you quit that job?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What products do you have in ou warehouse?
target: We package coffee and coco beans.

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked as a mailman. I got a lot of exercise during my work day.
target: How did you work as a mailman?

src:
You have applied for the job as a truck driver. What do you think is interesting about this job?
Driving is my passion and I like trucks.
target: What is you favorite truck to drive?

src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have usually get a long well with other people.
target: That is nice, but do you have any experience working with other people?

src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
No, I think that I understand what the job is about.
target: Ok, what is the job about then?

src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I have not had any other job before.
target: Ok, are you still in school then?

src:
How do you handle stressful situations in your work?
I have a lot of experience with stressful situations and I can handle them well.
target: Ok, can you give any examples of a stressful situation and how you handled it?

src:
Can you tell me about what type of relations you usually have with your colleagues?
I like working with them and I often have fun with them as well, but normally only during work time. I don't meet them much on my free time.
target: I see, having fun at work is very important. Do you have any examples of how you maintain good relations with your colleagues?

src:
Tell me a bit about yourself.
Of course. Personally or about myself as a working person?
target: You can do both. First about you as a person and them about your work experience.

src:
Can you tell me about what you know about this company and our products?
Of course. I know that you are a big restaurant franchise and that your food is very popular. Everyone I know have heard about you and loves your food.
target: Thank you. Is there any other specific reason that makes you apply for a job here?

src:
You have applied for the job as a Taxi Driver. What makes you interested in working for our company?
I am interested in working for your company because I have heard many great things about it.
target: Great! What have you heard about our company?

src:
Do you have a drivers licence?
Yes, I have a drivers licence.
target: How long have you had your drivers licence?

src:
Have you got any past experience working as a taxi driver?
No, I have never worked as a taxi driver before.
target: What have you worked as previously?

src:
Working as a taxi driver you need to be able to work during different time shifts. Is this okay for you?
Yes, this is fine.
target: Have you ever worked the night shift before? One of our shifts is between 10 PM-06 AM.

src:
Do you have any questions about this job?
Yes, how many customers does a taxi driver get per day?
target: It depends on the day and time of day. But between 15-20 customers per day.

src:
You have applied for one of our jobs as a cleaner. Have you previously worked in cleaning?
Hi, yes thats right. Yes I have previously worked as a cleaner.
target: Great! How many years have you worked as a cleaner?

src:
Our customers are spread across the city and our cleaners usually drive to the locations. Do you have a drivers licence?
Yes, I have a drivers licence.
target: How long have you had a drivers licence?

src:
What have you worked with previously?
I have previously worked as a cleaner for 2 years and I have worked in a warehouse for 5 years.
target: Great, what do you enjoy about working as a cleaner?

src:
Do you have any questions about the job?
Yes, what are the work hours?
target: The work hours are between 8 AM - 17 PM. You will have a lunch break between 11.30 AM - 12.15 PM.

src:
If we choose to hire you, when can you start working?
I am currently in between jobs, therefore I can start working immediately.
target: Great! We are looking to hire immediately.

src:
You have applied for the job as carpenter. How long have you worked with carpenting previously?
I started studying carpenting when I was 16 years old. I have worked with carpenting for 10 years, since I was 18 years old.
target: Great, you have a lot of experience. What do like about carpenting?

src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have a lot of experience in the field and have worked on a lot of different projects.
target: Interesting, what projects have you worked on before?

src:
This position requires you to work in a team of carpenters, have you got any experience with working in a team before?
Yes, I have worked with teams of carpenters before.
target: Do you prefer working in a team than working alone?

src:
Do you have any questions about the job?
Not really, I am very interested to get started!
target: Great, we will get in touch once we have interviewed all the applicants.

src:
You have applied for the job as a security guard. What makes you interested in this position?
I am interested in becoming a security guard as I think it will fit me very well.
target: Why do you think it will fit you well?

src:
Do you have any past experience in working as a security guard?
No, I do not have any past experience.
target: What have you previously worked as?

src:

Yes, I am a sociable person and like working with people.
target: It is a bonus if you get to know the client aswell, does this work for you?

src:
Are you able to work different shifts?
Yes, I do not mind working different shifts on different days.
target: Do you have any experience from working different shifts?

src:
Do you have any questions about the position?
Yes, what different places can I expect to work at?
target: We have security guards at shopping centres, different shops, the subway as well as at different industrial locations.

src:
You have applied for the job as a bartender. Why have you applied for this job?
I have applied for this job because I have heard it is a nice place to work at.
target: Do you know anyone who has worked here previously?

src:
How long have you worked as a bartender for?
I have worked as a bartender for 3 years.
target: Have you got experience working any different jobs?

src:
Are you able to work weekends?
Yes, I am able to work weekends.
target: Good, this position is for weekends only. Does this work for you?

src:
Do you have any education in making cocktails etc?
Yes, I took a course in making cocktails and drinks. It should have been attached to my application.
target: How long was the course you took?

src:
Do you have any questions about the position?
Yes, how many colleagues will I have?
target: Currently there are 3 other bartenders working at the bar.
